DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study clarify whether match acupoints effective single point electroacupuncture management chemotherapy-induced nausea vomiting .
DOC.brief_title: The Different Effectiveness Single Acupoint（ST36 CV12 ) v Matching Acupoints ( ST36 CV12 ) Chemotherapy-induced Nausea Vomiting
DOC.criteria: 1 . Be diagnose cancer need accept chemotherapy . 2 . The score Karnofsky ≥70 3 . Patients either gender old 18 year 4 . Patients receive chemotherapy outpatient inpatients 5 . Patients receive chemotherapy either first multiple cycle , patient take one time 6 . To receive chemotherapy contain cisplatin ( DDP≥75mg/m2 ) joint chemotherapy programme Anthracyclines ( Adriamycin≥40mg/m2 epirubicin≥60mg/m2 ) 7 . Life expectancy≥ 6 month 8 . Willing participate study randomize one four study group . 1 . To receive radiotherapy chemotherapy 2 . Gastrointestinal tumor 3 . Patients serious liver disease abnormal hepatorenal function ( AST , ACT , TBIL 3 time normal , BUN Cr 2 time normal ) 4 . Presence cardiac pacemaker 5 . Active skin infection 6 . Nausea and/or vomit result opioids metabolic imbalance ( electrolyte disturbance ) 7 . Patients unable provide selfcare communication 8 . Nausea and/or vomit result mechanical risk factor ( i.e. , intestinal obstruction ) 9 . Brain metastases 10 . Women pregnant lactating period
